name: Magical Zuma Game 19
description:
Dangerous Trip: Shooting Zombie Survive is a most marbles classic and amazing marble shooter. Challenge of marble shooter game is speed. The speed of your shooting has to be faster than the speed of moving marble lines.

Features:
- Hand eye coordination.
- Smooth user interface
- Challenge levels to revenge your talent
- Many secret maps to make the game more addictive.
- Marble games is a free, action puzzle game play for all ages
- Arrows, bombs and more interesting props you can got from game.
